content: uni solids 75% superwash using needle 4 purl one stitch from needle 1 move wool 25% polymid 1 skein shown in color 40 the first purl stitch from needle 3 onto needle 2 1 set of 5 dpns in us 1 5 2 5 metric tapestry needle needle 1 has 17 stitches needle 2 has 19 stitches needle 3 has 17 stitches needle 4 19 stitches pattern stitch broad spiral rib from barbara walker s first treasury round 1 *p2 k2tog but do not slip off the needle heel flap turn sl 1 stitch p4 k1 purl 24 m1 k1 p5 put the right needle between the two stitches just turn row 1 of heel flap pattern sl 1 k1 k2tog knit together and knit the first stitch again drop do not drop the stitches off the needle and work as both stitches off the left needle twice * repeat before k1 p1 *k1 sl 1wyif* 12 times k1 p1 k1 through the round k2tog do not drop the stitches off the needle and rounds 2 and 4 *p2 k4* around work as before k2 found an error have a question email me my email is nicole hindes@ gmail com you can also visit my blog allbuttonedup wordpress com and check out the free pattern pages to get the latest copy of this pattern with errata fixed i hope you enjoy this pattern 2 moc sserpdrow pudenottublla skcos 5-ot-9 continue heel flap turn row 2 and 4 of heel flap pattern sl 1 purl 4 k1 purl 25 k1 p5 row 3 sl 1 k2tog but do not slip off the needle put the right needle between the two stitches just knit together and knit the first stitch again drop both stitches off the left needle twice p1 *k1 sl 1wyif* 12 times k1 p1 k2tog but do not drop stitch off the needle put the right needle between the two stitches and through the first stitch and knit the stitch drop both stitches off the left needle twice k1 repeat row 1-4 8 times or about 2 5 inches ending with row 2 or 4 turn heel knit 20 sts ssk k1 turn next row sl 1 p5 p2tog p1 turn next row sl 1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 next row sl 1 purl to one stitch before gap purl 2 decrease p1 stitch back through to the back of the needle 4 knit all stitches continue as established until all stitches work continue in this manner until you have been worked ending with a knit have picked up and knit each stitch of repeat those 2 rounds until there are 18 row 21 stitches remaining the selvedge chain the goal of doing it sts on needle 1 and 4 you ll have to do using the needle that is currently holding this way is to make the selvedge stitch one extra decrease on one side the heel stitches pick up 17 stitches or
